LanguageData.Infusion.Settings.AccuracyOvercapping.De: Allows ranged weapon accuracy to go over 100%, with diminishing returns.
LanguageData.Infusion.Settings.BiocodeBonus.Descripti:
Treat biocoded equipments two quality higher when giving random infusions.
For example, normal quality biocoded items will get infusions of excellent quality.
LanguageData.Infusion.Settings.WeightFactor.Descripti:
Multiplies weight of infusions. Possible values are 0.0 ~ 2.0. Default is 1.0.
2.0 strictly picks the highest weights for a quality first. 0.0 means everything is possible.
Note: Chances still applies.
LanguageData.Infusion.Settings.ChanceFactor.Descripti:
Multiplies probability of infusions. Possible values are 0.0 ~ 100.0. Default is 1.0.
With default infusions, 100 would ensure everything will pass. 0 will effectively disable new infusions.
LanguageData.Infusion.Settings.BodyPartLimit: Limit infusions by body parts covered
LanguageData.Infusion.Settings.BodyPartLimit.Descript: Maximum infusion slot count will be limited to numbers of body part groups an apparel covers.
LanguageData.Infusion.Settings.LayerBonuses: More infusions for more layers occupied
LanguageData.Infusion.Settings.LayerBonuses.Descripti:
Increases max infusions by 1, per a layer an apparel occupies.
Applied after the body part limit, i.e. an apparel which only protects arms and torso will have its slots limited to 2, but if it occupies 3 layers, the limit will become 4 instead.
